name: Click Through
description:
Click Through is a puzzle game about teleporting through walls using a cursor conveniently attached to you, you'll have to solve mazes with the added ability of being able to go straight pass them.

-- Controls --

 [LClick]: Go through wall

 [WASD] or [ARROWKEYS]: Move

 [R]: Reset a level

 [I]/[O] (or scroll wheel): Zoom in and out

 [M]: Mute the music

 [Esc]: Quit the game

-- Extra Credit --

• Music: Sincerely by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Made in 48h for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme: "Joined Together"
